prompt: In a nocturnal charcoal cleanroom atrium, a single matte AI-driven retail analytics cube sits left-of-frame at eye level, rimmed in soft cyan neon and back-lit into a shallow depth-of-field magazine-cover composition with ~25% empty space at the top.
